titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS (EXCEEDING 28 DAYS STANDARD) - Description

div.p: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRALS (EXCEEDING 28 DAYS STANDARD) is the number of referrals for NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard) that have exceeded 28 days, by the number of days defined by NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE REFERRAL EXCEEDING 28 DAYS TIME BAND CATEGORY.
